Searching for a specific relaxation technique to improve sleep.
Progressive muscle relaxation is a technique that involves tensing and then slowly releasing each muscle group.
What is the best time to practice this technique?
Plan: 1) Search for the best time to practice progressive muscle relaxation. 2) Return the answer.
Searching for the best time to practice progressive muscle relaxation.
The best time to practice progressive muscle relaxation is before bedtime to help unwind and prepare for sleep.
